title: pyBraille
description: Text image to Braille in Python 3, utilizing Microsoft Visual Recognition API. Placed 2nd place in the University of Alberta HackED 2018 Hackathon. Demonstrated the project via an Arduino which shows the Braille representation per letter.

title: Taxonomy SDK
description: A npm package replicating the SDK used in data tracking. Events are transcribed by the developer based on actions and UI targets. Distributed via local storage and flushed out on capacity or timeout. Events can be stored within a database and used for marketing or technical decisions.

title: Taxonomy Model UI
description: Complementary project displaying the usage of the Taxonomy SDK that was developed. A set amount of UI elements shown to demonstrate how the SDK works. All events are flushed in the console of the browser

title: Cloud Listings
description: Full-stack web scraping application to monitor multiple car listings in one screen from Kijiji. Save time by having all the vehicles you are interested in collected in one place to check on.
